Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

HI,

I'm trying to get deduplication working in Heritrix 1.14.4. It seems like
there is a problem using BDB as the persistent history store. I'm running
into the problem mentioned in
https://webarchive.jira.com/browse/HER-1627
where getClassCatalog tries to open the read-only history DB with write
access.

Based on the comments in Jira, it looks like this was never opened as a
distinct bug from HER-1627 and only fixed as a side-issue in the H3 tree.

Is PersistLogProcessor the recommended way to do deduplication with H1? Or
have I just misconfigured the PersistStoreProcessor somehow?


Thanks,

- Solomon

--001636e90c3cb850150486e10b97
Content-Type: text/html; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
